snippet: Lionel Messi’s bone bruise on his left knee could force him to miss Sunday’s Spanish league match at Real Betis, but probably no games beyond that.
abstract: Barcelona forward Lionel Messi, who was injured while trying to tie record for most goals in a season, may be out for upcoming Spanish league soccer match at Real Betis; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi’s bone bruise on his left knee could force him to miss Sunday’s Spanish league match at Real Betis, but probably no games beyond that.
